name: Capping Beam (V140421)
Prior to Capping Beam Operations
Confirm RL’s of capping beam
Confirm excavation for capping beam has been complete and ready for formwork to commence
Set out of capping beam complete
Confirm engineers design of capping beam
Attached/referenced below as applicable
Attach structural engineer inspection prior to concrete pour (All items closed out)
Engineer inspections attached/referenced below
Concrete pre-pour checks - As per below
Confirm mPa, slump and agg size of concrete prior to ordering
Confirm formwork faces are clean and will provide required class finish
Confirm formwork is adequately braced to reduce blow-out occurrence
Confirm pile connection bars are clean and free of debris
FINAL - Pass when happy to proceed with work(s) (Any issues please comment below)
After Capping Beam Poured
Attach surveyors spot check – Confirm tolerance of finished concrete surfaces – Ensure no movement to the capping beam during pour
Confirm surveyor spot checks levels and attach markup
Confirm stripping is complete All exposed faces are clear of formwork
Confirm vibration was adequate – no air pockets, agg evenly distributed If not, comment rectification method required
Confirm no blow-out occurred If occurred, comment rectification method required
Confirm finish of concrete is adequate (broom/trowel/helicopter finish)
Obtain all concrete tests at 1 day
Test Strength Mpa
Attach concrete test result
Obtain all concrete tests at 4 days
Test Strength Mpa
Attach concrete test result
Obtain all concrete tests at 28 days
Test Strength Mpa
Attach concrete test result
Sign-Off
Attach Subcontractor ITP - Attached below as applicable
Subcontractor Sign Off
Aland Sign Off
